short_description: locus - logistics optimization & decision-making platform is a tech company based in special capital region of jakarta, indonesia.
long_description: locus is a global decision-making platform that automates human decisions in supply chain to provide efficiency, transparency, and consistency in logistics operations. the platform uses deep machine learning and proprietary algorithms to offer smart logistics solutions like route optimization, real-time fleet tracking, insights and analytics, geo-coding, vehicle allocation and utilization, sales beat planning, automated shipment sortation and more. locus usps: - ai-backed route planning that has a negligible dependence on human intelligence. - proprietary geocoding engine which uses ml & nlp - fleet/resource optimization: right sales executive to right shops at the right intervals. - machine learning for strategic decision making.
